wholeText.mainContentText:
范將軍 General Fan {Testy Catcher}
After Fan dead, he became the deity in Jia Jiang’s group.He always work together with Hsien. They are like the leaders so their powers are stronger than other deities. That’s why their makeups look more terrible and fearful.
When Fan and Hsien are exorcising ghosts, every deity will be arranged in special form and use special dance steps.The basic steps they used is “Toe-out”. Fan’s personality is testy and like busy bees. So, his steps will faster than Hsien’s steps.
When Fan and Hsien are dacing, they will make a stop in some special pose. And Fan’s pose is always lower than Hsien’s pose.
